testsuite.name: org.maven.MercuryLoginTest

testcase.name: loginTest
testcase.system-out: User Name field is available and entered the data User able to login in to application successfully User is able to login into application successfully User is logged out from the application successfully

testsuite.system-out: Script execting on Chromebrowser Browser opened and application url entered Creating row based data [Row1]{Password=mercury, UserName=mercury} Converting results to an Array for TestNg Finished results to an Array for TestNg User Name field is available and entered the data User able to login in to application successfully User is able to login into application successfully User is logged out from the application successfully Test execution complete and browser session closed
